settings.content: For best results, upload images that are 1280px in width and under 600px in height. Try to keep your slideshow images the same size.

settings.label: Stretch Slideshow to Full Screen Width

settings.content: Associate Product Variants with Product Images Match up your product’s variants with your product image’s ALT text. The product variants must be exactly the same as the product image’s ALT text and contain unique name. [Read more →](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942376-associate-product-variants-with-product-images)

settings.label: Include "Special Instructions" Text Box on Checkout
Shipping Rates Calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.
